# target

**Instance Property**

Returns a value that indicates the target of the drawable type.

## Declaration

```swift
var target: LayerRenderer.Drawable.Target { get }
```

## Discussion

When drawing for the drawable this can be used to alter what is rendered for different targets. Renderer should always prioritize [doc://com.apple.compositorservices/documentation/CompositorServices/LayerRenderer/Drawable/Target-swift.enum/builtIn] target type.

## Retrieving the target

- **LayerRenderer.Drawable.Target**: The target where the drawable will be displayed/used.
